title: Cyclite ultralight bikepacking frame bags add maximum storage, minimum weight
content:
Cyclite claims these new bikepacking frame bags are the lightest available. The Bavarian company started out in 2020, after the founders had become “increasingly bothered by the fact that there are simply no ultra-light and well-designed transport solutions for bikes”. Offering a complete bikepacking bag setup, including top tube bag, saddle bag, frame bag and

The post Cyclite ultralight bikepacking frame bags add maximum storage, minimum weight appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
